## obtain data from FMSB package 

```{r}
df = data.frame(Jpop)
head(df)
  
df = data.frame(t(df))
names(df) = 0:85
df = df[-1, ]
 
df$year = sapply(row.names(df), str_extract, "\\d+")
df$sex = sapply(row.names(df), str_extract, "\\w")
df[,1:86] = sapply(df[,1:86], as.numeric)

```

```{r}

 
df
df %>% group_by(year)

df %>% group_by(sex)

df %>% group_by(year, sex)
```
